backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining user profiles, listings, bookings, and mixin integrations for storage, authorization, and Stripe payments.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old listing structures to new ones by adding a status timestamp across all stored maps.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry document with SEO metadata and root mount point for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App entry configuring TanStack Router routes, React Query client, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityCoun: Displays live availability counts for various property types with loading skeletons and animated cards.
frontend/src/components/BookingSteps.tsx: Renders a three‑step visual guide for booking properties, with icons and category‑based styling.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedListings: Fetches and displays featured listings using ListingCard components, with skeletons for loading states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and copyright.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main header with navigation, authentication handling, and admin/user‑specific options.
Displays an interactive India map with animated city markers showing active and coming‑soon locations.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the page with header, footer, routed content, and conditionally shows a profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard.tsx: Renders a stylized listing card with availability, rating, category icons, and click-to-view navigation logic.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard3D.ts: Displays a 3D-animated listing card showing images, ratings, availability, and category icons.
frontend/src/components/ListingDetailMod: Empty file placeholder for a listing detail modal component.
frontend/src/components/MapSection.tsx: Shows an animated map-like section with bouncing markers and floating info badges using event marker data.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Provides a modal for creating a user profile with form inputs and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/PropertyStatusBa: Renders a badge indicating a property's status with specific icons and styling per status type.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Handles displaying reviews and submitting new ones with rating selection and authenticated user checks.
frontend/src/components/StarRating.tsx: A star-based rating component supporting interactive selection and variable sizes.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialBubbl: Empty file placeholder for a testimonial bubbles component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as profiles, listings, reviews, events, and admin actions using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file configuring Tailwind, color variables, fonts, and custom animations for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUsPage.tsx: Renders the STYO About Us page with sections for company registration and leadership details.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Implements the admin dashboard page, loading admin data, handling quick publish, city charges, notifications, and access control.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPolicyPage.tsx: Renders a styled booking policy page with scrollable sections detailing platform terms and disclaimers.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryWorldPage.tsx: Displays a grid of category cards that navigate to filtered listings when clicked.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home screen featuring animated category cards, lazy‑loaded sections, and navigation to listings.
frontend/src/pages/ListingPage.tsx: Shows property listings with category filtering, loading states, and lazy‑loaded 3D cards and map.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Provides user profile viewing and editing with save and logout actions, using identity and query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/PropertyManagementPag: Provides UI for owners to create, edit, and update their property listings including availability, location, and status fields.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPropertySubmiss: Implements a public-facing form allowing non‑logged‑in users to submit property listings with validation and image uploads.
frontend/src/pages/UnlockPage.tsx: Displays property details and handles unlock requests so logged‑in users can access owner contact information and interact with the listing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, shadows, animations, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project’s current state and pending feature requests related to property status transition logic and timeouts.
